thread.title: Leupold Optics Named Affiliate Partner of 2025 Precision Rifle Series
thread.title_full: Leupold Optics Named Affiliate Partner of 2025 Precision Rifle Series

title: Leupold Optics Named Affiliate Partner of 2025 Precision Rifle Series
text:
|
The Precision Rifle Series is excited to announce Leupold optics as an Affiliate Partner for the 2025 season. Renowned for their high-performance optics, Leupold’s commitment to precision, innovation, and reliability makes them the perfect partner to support the PRS community. This partnership will bring Leupold optic’s world-class optics to PRS competitors, helping them elevate their performance throughout the season.
Leupold & Stevens, Inc. is an American-based company that has been providing high-performance optics for over 100 years. With a focus on durability, accuracy, and innovation, Leupold optics are trusted by precision rifle shooters, hunters, and outdoor enthusiasts alike. Known for their premium riflescopes, binoculars, and rangefinders, Leupold continues to set the standard for optical performance.
“We are honored to announce Leupold optics as an affiliate partner for the 2025 PRS season,” said Ken Wheeler, Director of the Precision Rifle Series. “Leupold’s reputation for innovation and quality perfectly aligns with our mission to grow the sport and support our competitors. Their world-class optics will play a vital role in helping shooters push the limits of their skills and perform at their best during PRS events.”
Leupold’s dedication to supporting the sport of precision shooting goes beyond providing exceptional optics. Through their partnership with the PRS, Leupold is investing in the growth of the sport by not only providing key support to matches and competitors alike, but also by helping to foster a community of shooters committed to excellence. Leupold actively supports PRS events, ensuring that both the sport and its athletes have access to the best equipment available. By offering top-tier optics, Leupold ensures that shooters have the tools they need to perform under the toughest conditions and achieve success on the range, while also helping to elevate the overall standard of precision shooting. Their ongoing investment in the PRS community reflects their passion for advancing the sport and supporting shooters at every level.
The PRS values its partnership with the Leupold Team and looks forward to working together to support its members, elevate national Pro Series competitions, and contribute to the growth of the sport. In 2025, the PRS will host 50 national-level precision rifle competitions, culminating in the PRS Pro Series Finale on November 1-2, 2025, at WAR Rifles – Geissele Range in Tremont, Pennsylvania, where Leupold optics will proudly serve as a sponsor.
For more information on the Precision Rifle Series, visit: https://www.precisionrifleseries.com/
To learn more about Leupold Optics please visit: https://www.leupold.com/
Press Release Contact: Camdyn Powers
Precision Rifle Series Marketing Specialist
E-mail: Camdyn.powers@precisionrifleseries.com
Connect with the PRS on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PRS.series
Connect with the PRS on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/precisionrifleseries/
